job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field

jd: From: Kishore V, Vy Systems kishore.v@vysystems.com Reply to: kishore.v@vysystems.com BUSINESS ANALYST With Commercial Domain -C2C- Foster City - CA(Onsite) Exp 14+Responsibilities : - Lead the analysis and documentation of business requirements for commercial projects.- Oversee the development and implementation of project plans to ensure timely delivery.- Provide detailed insights and recommendations to improve business processes.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze data. - Ensure that project objectives are met by monitoring progress and addressing any issues.- Facilitate communication between stakeholders to ensure alignment and understanding.- Conduct risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies.- Develop and maintain project documentation, including requirements, plans, and reports.- Utilize data analysis tools to interpret complex data sets and provide actionable insights. - Support the development of business cases and project proposals.- Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices.- Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance project outcomes. - Provide training and support to team members on project management methodologies.Qualifications : - Possess a Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field. - Have a minimum of 10 years of experience in commercial project management. - Demonstrate strong analytical and problemsolving skills :- Show proficiency in project management software and tools.- Exhibit excellent communication and interpersonal skills.- Have experience with data analysis and reporting. - Display a strong understanding of business processes and requirements. - Be able to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.- Show a commitment to continuous learning and professional development.- Have a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects.- Demonstrate the ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams- Exhibit strong organizational and time management skills. - Be detail-oriented and able to manage multiple priorities simultaneously.
